description: Notifies Migration Hub of the current status, progress, or other detail regarding a migration task. This API has the following traits:

parameters.name: MigrationTaskName
parameters.description: Unique identifier that references the migration task. Do not store personal data in this field.

parameters.name: Task
parameters.description: Information about the task's progress and status. Status of the task - Not Started, In-Progress, Complete. StatusDetail (string) --- Details of task status as notified by a migration tool. A tool might use this field to provide clarifying information about the status that is unique to that tool or that explains an error state. ProgressPercent (integer) --- Indication of the percentage completion of the task.

nested_params.name: Status
nested_params.description: Status of the task - Not Started, In-Progress, Complete.

nested_params.name: StatusDetail
nested_params.description: Details of task status as notified by a migration tool. A tool might use this field to provide clarifying information about the status that is unique to that tool or that explains an error state.

nested_params.name: ProgressPercent
nested_params.description: Indication of the percentage completion of the task.

parameters.name: UpdateDateTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the task was gathered.

parameters.name: NextUpdateSeconds
parameters.description: Number of seconds after the UpdateDateTime within which the Migration Hub can expect an update. If Migration Hub does not receive an update within the specified interval, then the migration task will be considered stale.
